title: Iconoclasm: Political Empowerment for the New Millennium
description: 'Iconoclasm' is a work that embodies historical context, sociology, civil analysis, and prospects of globalized economics as a means to empower the reader for progressive politics. Each section is designed to remove or augment preconceived notions of social structures, in order to garner a more inclusive and realistic view of the world as a community.
author: Jaron D Pearlman
